pl.marcinmazur.portfolio.dao

Interface ContactFormMessageDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContactFormMessageDaoImpl

    public interface ContactFormMessageDao
    Repository class for performing database operations on ContactFormMessage and Comment objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addComment(Comment comment)
      Saves the comment in the database
      void deleteComment(long commentId)
      Deletes the Comment with the given id

      Return the ContactFormMessage with the given id

      Returns the list of ContactFormMessage for given type of the list
      List<Object[]> getMonthlyMessagesData(String startDate, String endDate)
      Returns the date and the number of contact form messages as a list of Object[] for given date range

      Returns the number of the contact form messages for given HQL Statement

      Returns the number of contact form messages with given date range

        Parameters:

      • getContactFormMessage

        ContactFormMessage getContactFormMessage(Long contactFormMessageId)
        Return the ContactFormMessage with the given id
        Parameters:
        contactFormMessageId - The Long containing the id of the contact form messages
        Returns:
        A ContactFormMessage representing the contactFormMessage with the given id

      • getListOfContactFormMessages

        List<ContactFormMessage> getListOfContactFormMessages(String listType,
                                                      Integer resultStartRange,
                                                      Integer resultRange)
        Returns the list of ContactFormMessage for given type of the list
        Parameters:
        listType - A String containing the type of the list (new-archive-all)
        resultStartRange - An Integer containing the first returning index
        resultRange - An Integer containing the number of results
        Returns:
        A List<ContactFormMessage> representing the list of contactFormMessages

        Parameters:
        listType - A String containing the type of the list (new-archive-all)
        Returns:

      • getNumberOfContactFormMessagesForGivenDate

        long getNumberOfContactFormMessagesForGivenDate(String startDate,
                                                String endDate)
        Returns the number of all contact form messages from the given date range
        Parameters:
        startDate - The String containing the first day of the range
        endDate - The String containing the last day of the range
        Returns:
        A long representing the number of contact form messages

        endDate - The String containing the last day of the range

        A long representing the number of contact form messages

      • getMonthlyMessagesData

        List<Object[]> getMonthlyMessagesData(String startDate,
                                      String endDate)
        Returns the date and the number of contact form messages as a list of Object[] for given date range
        Parameters:
        startDate - The String containing the first day of the month
        endDate - The String containing the last day of the month
        Returns:
        A List<Object[]> representing the list of date and number of contact form messages

        Returns the number of the contact form messages for given HQL Statement
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        An int representing the number of the contact form messages
